overview:
JAC Outsourcing, member of the TAZAKI Group, is global Outsourcing service; provide delivering business solutions to its clients. Our products are Employee Outsourcing, Management Contract and Payroll Service.

This method provides a comprehensive solution for business agents who are recruiting qualified employees through recruitment services and in managing personnel administration. The employees’ status is that of JAC Business Center employees assigned to corporate users. Both the qualifications and salary structure will have been previously agreed upon by the corporate users and employees. This service is suitable for companies that are mainly focused on their core business. Furthermore, this provides a solution for companies that lack the budget to recruit new employees: the operational expenses can cover the outsourcing. As a result, the company will have access to a range of qualified employees and a large database
